name: Music_2771.wav
keywords: ['techno song', 'dance song', 'female voice', 'vocables', 'repetitive vocal melody', 'synth music', 'programmed percussion', 'moderate melody']
caption: This techno song features a female voice singing only in non-lexical vocables. This is accompanied by programmed percussion. The percussion pauses after one and a half bars. It plays again after half a bar in an eighth note pattern. A synth plays a melody that is the same as that of the voice. The melody is repetitive. This song has a happy mood. This song can be played in a club.
